name: Stream Gradient
description: Change in elevation along Flowline length
method: (𝑡𝑜𝑝 𝑜𝑓 𝑟𝑒𝑎𝑐ℎ 𝑒𝑙𝑒𝑣𝑎𝑡𝑖𝑜𝑛 −𝑏𝑜𝑡𝑡𝑜𝑚 𝑜𝑓 𝑟𝑒𝑎𝑐ℎ 𝑒𝑙𝑒𝑣𝑎𝑡𝑖𝑜𝑛)/(𝑛𝑒𝑡𝑤𝑜𝑟𝑘 𝑙𝑒𝑛𝑔𝑡ℎ)
docs_url: Hack, J. T. (1973). Stream-profile analysis and stream-gradient index. Journal of Research of the U.S. Geological Survey, 1(4), 421–429. Nagel, D., Buffington, J., & Isaak, D. (2006). Comparison of methods for estimating stream channel gradient using GIS. USDA Forest Service, Rocky Mountain Research Station Boise Aquatic Sciences Lab.

name: Valley Gradient
description: Change in elevation along Centerline length
method: (𝑡𝑜𝑝 𝑜𝑓 𝑠𝑒𝑔𝑚𝑒𝑛𝑡 𝑒𝑙𝑒𝑣. −𝑏𝑜𝑡𝑡𝑜𝑚 𝑜𝑓 𝑠𝑒𝑔𝑚𝑒𝑛𝑡 𝑒𝑙𝑒𝑣.)/(𝑣𝑎𝑙𝑙𝑒𝑦 𝑏𝑜𝑡𝑡𝑜𝑚 𝑐𝑒𝑛𝑡𝑒𝑟𝑙𝑖𝑛𝑒)

name: Stream Order
description: standard strahler order attribute from NHD

name: Headwater
description: Is greater than 50% of the analysis window marked as is_headwater?

name: Active Floodplain Area
description: Area of VBET Active Flood Plain

name: Active Channel Ratio
description: Active Channel Area to Inactive + active floodplain polygons + Channel area polygon Ratio
method: Channel area /(active + inactive floodplains + channel area)

name: Relative Flow Length
method: sum of all blue line lenght/valley length

name: Stream Size Metric
description: Stream Size (calculated as integrated channel width)

name: Ecoregion III
description: which ecoregion contains the majority of the analysis window?

name: Ecoregion IV
description: which ecoregion contains the majority of the analysis window?
